listData.name: Bonus Saver
listData.description: Save for a holiday, car or even a deposit for a new home! Summerland's Bonus Saver account is designed to help you reach your savings goals. Deposit $100 per calendar month & make no withdrawals to earn bonus interest.

features.additionalInfo: Open accounts, check balances, view transactions, transfer funds, schedule payments, BPAY, eStatements, SMS alerts, activate cards, change card PIN, mark card lost or stolen, loan redraw, loan status update, accept loan contracts and send secure messages.
Enjoy 1 free staff assisted transaction per month on the Easy Access Fee Package.
Enjoy 10  free transactions per month on the Essential Access Fee Package.
Set up a pay ID to receive lightning fast payments.
Save on paper, receive and view your statements online with eStatements.

Easy Access Fee Package customers receive unlimited eftpos, Visa credit, payWave, direct debits, internal, external funds transfer & BPAY via internet banking or the banking app. 

Essential Access Fee Package customers receive unlimited Visa credit, payWave, internal funds transfer & BPAY via internet banking or the banking app.

eligibility.additionalValue: An eligibility constraint based on residency status applies.

fees.name: Easy Access Monthly Access Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For those who appreciate the convenience of managing your money your own way. You'll receive access to our rebate scheme which could see you paying no access fee at all depending on your combined savings, investments, credit cards and loans balance. It's our way to say thanks for being a loyal customer.

discounts.description: Only customers younger than a maximum age receive the discount

eligibility.additionalInfo: Customers under 25 years or undertaking study at a recognised Australian education institution receive this discount.
A discount will be applied depending on your combined savings, investments, credit cards and loans balance.

A discount will be applied depending on your combined savings, investments, credit cards and loans balance.

fees.name: Easy Access cheques included in deposits
fees.additionalInfo: 3 FREE per month.

fees.name: Essential Access electronic transaction
fees.additionalInfo: Essential access electronic transactions include direct debits, NPP payments, eftpos, external funds transfer via internet banking or the banking app (including auto transfers). 10 FREE per month across the combined total of Essential Access electronic transactions and Essential Access staff assisted transactions.

fees.name: Essential Access staff assisted transaction

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Principal and interest, interest only, guarantor loans. Non-Residential Security. Fixed interest rates as shown are for loans with a maximum loan to valuation ratio of 80%. Should the loan to valuation ratio exceed 80% then the interest rate is subject to negotiation on application. A fixed rate break cost fee may be payable and equates to a reasonable estimate of our loss caused by the break.

Principal and interest, interest only, guarantor loans. Residential Security. Fixed interest rates as shown are for loans with a maximum loan to valuation ratio of 80%. fees.name: Easy Access Monthly Access Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For those who appreciate the convenience of managing your money your own way. You'll receive access to our rebate scheme which could see you paying no access fee at all depending on your combined savings, investments, credit cards and loans balance. It's our way to say thanks for being a loyal customer.

It's our way to say thanks for being a loyal customer.

features.additionalInfo: Open accounts, check balances, view transactions, transfer funds, schedule payments, BPAY, eStatements, SMS alerts, activate cards, change card PIN, mark card lost or stolen, loan redraw, loan status update, accept loan contracts and send secure messages.
Set up a pay ID to receive lightning fast payments.
Save on paper, receive and view your statements online with eStatements.
Access additional payments made to your home loan. Minimum $500.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Lending criteria apply.
The property securing the loan must meet the required sustainability criteria.

eligibility.additionalValue: An eligibility constraint based on residency status applies.

fees.name: Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Valuation Fee - Residential $300; Valuation Fee - Non-Residential is at cost. Includes commercial, rural & rural lifestyle properties over 30ha.

fees.name: Valuation Fee - Construction
fees.additionalInfo: Payable in addition to the Valuation Fee - residential.

fees.name: Legal Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Legal Fee - residential $200; Legal Fee - Non Residential at cost.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Owner occupier, principal and interest repayments only. Minimum new loan amount of $150,000, with a loan to valuation ratio of 60% of less. Eligibility for new borrower specials for customers seeking both fixed and variable rates will be based on the combined loan amount.

Owner occupier, principal and interest repayments only. Minimum new loan amount of $150,000, with a loan to valuation ratio of 80% of less. Eligibility for new borrower specials for customers seeking both fixed and variable rates will be based on the combined loan amount.
Owner occupier, principal and interest loans. Minimum loan amount of $30,000.

discounts.description: The discount is only available during an introductory period

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Investment, principal and interest, interest only loans. Minimum loan amount of $250,000.

Investment, principal and interest repayments only. Minimum new loan amount of $250,000, with a loan to valuation ratio of 60% of less. Eligibility for new borrower specials for customers seeking both fixed and variable rates will be based on the combined loan amount.

Investment, principal and interest repayments only. Minimum new loan amount of $250,000, with a loan to valuation ratio of 80% of less. Eligibility for new borrower specials for customers seeking both fixed and variable rates will be based on the combined loan amount.

Investment, principal and interest repayments only. Minimum new loan amount of $500,000, with a loan to valuation ratio of 60% of less. Eligibility for new borrower specials for customers seeking both fixed and variable rates will be based on the combined loan amount.

Investment, principal and interest repayments only. Minimum new loan amount of $500,000, with a loan to valuation ratio of 80% of less. Eligibility for new borrower specials for customers seeking both fixed and variable rates will be based on the combined loan amount.

listData.description: An easy to use transaction account with no monthly fee for those operating a not for profit organisation or charity.

features.additionalInfo: Open accounts, check balances, view transactions, transfer funds, schedule payments, BPAY, eStatements, SMS alerts, activate cards, change card PIN, mark card lost or stolen, loan redraw, loan status update, accept loan contracts and send secure messages.
20 FREE per month across the combined total of Business and Community electronic transactions and Business and Community staff assisted transactions.
Set up a pay ID to receive lightning fast payments.
Save on paper, receive and view your statements online with eStatements.
Simplify your bookkeeping with direct transaction feeds.
Customers receive unlimited  internal funds transfer, external funds transfer & BPAY transactions via internet banking or the banking app.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Only a not for profit organisation or charity can apply for this product.

eligibility.additionalValue: A Permanent Australian Resident including those working overseas. Entities must be a Permanent Resident of Australia,

fees.name: Staff assisted transaction
fees.additionalInfo: Business and Community staff assisted transactions include in-branch deposit, branch withdrawal, business express deposit, cheque withdrawal, cheque encashment, one-off internal funds transfer, one-off external funds transfer, one-off BPAY, Bank@Post deposit & Bank@Post withdrawal. 5 FREE per month Business and Community staff assisted transactions.

fees.name: Cheques included in deposits
fees.additionalInfo: 20 FREE per month.

features.additionalInfo: Unlimited Visa purchases.
Consolidate your Credit Card Balances with a Summerland Credit Card.

Open accounts, check balances, view transactions, transfer funds, schedule payments, BPAY, eStatements, SMS alerts, activate cards, change card PIN, mark card lost or stolen, loan redraw, loan status update, accept loan contracts and send secure messages.
Up to 55 interest free days on purchases.

Get paid to shop with Summerlands Credit Card Rewards Program. Earn one reward point for every Australian dollar spent on eligible transactions. These points are then converted into cash and paid back to you every six months. The maximum number of reward points you can earn during each 12 month period is 100,000 points. Each 12 month period is determined from your card establishment date.
